mapper.select: select video_main.*, users.user_name, good.good_time, collection.collection_date from video_main left join users on video_main.teacher_id=users.user_id left join good on good.good_type='V' and good.good_id = video_main.video_main_id and good.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join collection on collection.collection_type='V' and collection.collection_id = video_main.video_main_id and collection.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} where video_main.public_status='public' and video_main.verify_status='通过' ORDER BY video_main.video_date DESC

select video_main.*, users.user_name, good.good_time, collection.collection_date from video_main left join users on video_main.teacher_id = users.user_id left join good on good.good_type='V' and good.good_id = video_main.video_main_id and good.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join collection on collection.collection_type='V' and collection.collection_id = video_main.video_main_id and collection.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} where video_main.public_status='public' and video_main.school_id=#{schoolId} and video_main.verify_status='通过' ORDER BY video_main.video_date DESC
select * from video where video_main_id=#{videoMainId} and episode_id=#{episodeId}

select video_main.*, users.user_name, users.fans_num, users.icon, video.video_id, video.video_title, video.video_length, video.video_size, video.video_date, video.episode_id, video.video_source, good.good_time, collection.collection_date, follow_teacher.follow_teacher_date, label.label_id, label.label_name from video_main left join video on video_main.video_main_id=video.video_main_id left join users on video_main.teacher_id = users.user_id left join follow_teacher on follow_teacher.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} and follow_teacher.teacher_id = video_main.teacher_id left join good on good.good_type='V' and good.good_id = video_main.video_main_id and good.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join collection on collection.collection_type='V' and collection.collection_id = video_main.video_main_id and collection.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join v_label on v_label.video_main_id = video_main.video_main_id left join label on label.label_id = v_label.label_id where video_main.video_main_id=#{videoMainId} ORDER BY video.episode_id ASC

select video_main.*, users.user_name from video_main left join users on video_main.teacher_id = users.user_id where video_main.public_status='public' ORDER BY video_main.heat_of_video DESC limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select video_main.*, users.user_name, good.good_time, collection.collection_date from video_main left join users on video_main.teacher_id=users.user_id left join good on good.good_type='V' and good.good_id = video_main.video_main_id and good.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join collection on collection.collection_type='V' and collection.collection_id = video_main.video_main_id and collection.wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} left join v_label on v_label.video_main_id = video_main.video_main_id where video_main.public_status='public' and v_label.label_id = #{labelId} and video_main.verify_status='通过' ORDER BY video_main.heat_of_video DESC limit #{pageInfo.pageNum},#{pageInfo.pageSize}
mapper.update: update video_main set good_num = good_num + 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set comment_num = comment_num + 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set play_num = play_num + 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set comment_num = comment_num - 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set collection_num = collection_num + 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set collection_num = collection_num - 1 where video_main_id = #{videoId}
update video_main set heat_of_video = #{heatOfVideo} where video_main_id = #{videoMainId}
